transArray.content: It's pretty good, both in terms of service attitude and environmental sanitation.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the hotel service and room hygiene. We are very happy to bring you a good stay experience. The hotel strictly abides by the Huazhu Group's room cleaning procedures. We will continue to work hard to provide every guest with a comfortable and secure stay environment. All hotel staff look forward to your next visit and wish you a happy life. Manager: Ji Hongjiao
